==Walkthrough==
# Enter the room and deafeat the enemies
#* Wave 1:{{Enemy List|Eremite Daythunder;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier;Eremite Crossbow;Eremite Axe Vanguard}}
#* Wave 2:{{Enemy List|Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*2;Eremite Linebreaker*2}}
#* Wave 3:{{Enemy List|Eremite Desert Clearwater;Eremite Crossbow;Eremite Sword-Dancer*2}}
# Enter the room on the left to access the first puzzle, adjust the mean to the middle position and change its color to golden
# Defeat the enemy{{Enemy List|Primal Construct: Repulsor}}
#* A [[Common Chest]] will unlock
# Advance through the corridor to access the second puzzle
#* Rotate the mechanism in the middle of the room twice
#* Set the eastern beam to lowest height
# Defeat the enemies{{Enemy List|Primal Construct: Prospector*2}}
#* A Common Chest will unlock
# Defeat the enemies{{Enemy List|Primal Construct: Repulsor;Primal Construct: Prospector;Primal Construct: Reshaper}}
#* An [[Exquisite Chest]] will unlock
# Advance to the end of the room to access the third puzzle
#* Set the weastern beam on the left side of the room to highest height, then change its color to purple
#* Change the beam on the right side of the room to purple, then change it back to golden
# Defeat the enemies
#* Wave 1:{{Enemy List|Eremite Axe Vanguard;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*2;Eremite Crossbow*2}}
#* Wave 2:{{Enemy List|Eremite Daythunder;Eremite Sunfrost;Eremite Axe Vanguard*3}}
#* Wave 3:{{Enemy List|Eremite Desert Clearwater;Eremite Daythunder;Eremite Sunfrost;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*2}}
#* Wave 4:{{Enemy List|Eremite Galehunter/optional;Eremite Stone Enchanter;Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier*3/optional}}
#* A [[Precious Chest]] will unlock
# Use the elevator to access the second floor, then go into the door on the right
# Continue on the path until a door on the left, the player will be teleported outside the domain once the door is opened

==Chests==
* 2 [[Common Chest]]s
* 1 [[Exquisite Chest]]
* 1 [[Precious Chest]]
